body_html:
@ybsave without knowing too much about your problem, my recommendation would be:

  1. If it never changes, hard code it
  2. If it's known when the batch starts, pass it in as an Input
  3. If it's calculated during a batch run, calculate it using a Lambda layer or custom Layer

Hope that helps! Going to close this out as this is intended behavior

body:

1) If it never changes, hard code it
2) If it's known when the batch starts, pass it in as an Input
3) If it's calculated during a batch run, calculate it using a Lambda layer or custom Layer

Hope that helps! Going to close this out as this is intended behavior
